name: Successfully return list of dishes sorted by price

steps.name: When the user send a GET request to the end point with dishType "Appetizers" and sort by price in "desc"
Then the status code should be 200 or 204
And the response body should have all the parameters
And check if the dishes are shown in correct order "desc" of price
